section.title: Past simple question form
section.sectiontitle: In the question, We use Did + I/you/he/she/it/we/they + verb to make the questions.
section.text1a: Did they have a good holiday? Yes, they did.
section.text2a: Did he come by bus? No, he didn't.
section.sectiontitle2: We can use What/Where/When/What time/Who/Why/How to ask for more information.
section.text3: Did they go on holiday? Yes, they did.
section.text4: Did you have a good time last night? Yes, we did.
